title: Prof.Birch
description:
"Hello, I’m the Prof.Birch ! 
 I’m a bit in a hurry so i will be brief about bonus tiles."

title: Prof.Birch
description: "Each Poketile has his own type and that type has an important role to play on the board."

title: Prof.Birch
description:
"Sometimes, you will see some tiles, on the board, represented by a specific type. 
 These are called bonus tiles."

title: Prof.Birch
description: "When you play a Poketile of the same type on one of them, all his stats are boosted and the color of the numbers goes to blue."

title: Prof.Birch
description: "Conversely, when you play a Poketile of different type on one of them, all his stats are lowered and the color of the numbers goes to red."

title: Prof.Birch
description: "Each circle in a bonus tile represents +1 or -1 on all values of a Poketile stats."

title: Prof.Birch
description:
"Now you are ready. 
 Do your best to synergize the most possible in this training."
